creator: Igor Chekachkov
caption: Klim (4 y.o.), Akim (6 y.o.) and Miya (1 y.o) from Kharkiv on their room in dorm in Lviv, where they moved after Russia invaded Ukraine. After the invasion their mother Olesya discovered she has cancer and she cannot have a treatment in Ukraine. Her family is trying to leave the country but they cannot because they are waiting for the documents. They live with their 4 children in the dorm
